name: Results of AEW
author: Burkie

sections.description:
You can now display results from All Elite Wrestling events from all shows like Dynamite, Rampage, Collision, PPVs and others.

You also have the option to just display recent recents from a particular wrestler, handy if you have a wrestlers profile on your website.

Give your visitors the ability to quickly browse through recent results.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the results-of-aew directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create a post or page and enter [aewresults count=’5′] and adjust the number to a max of 100
  4. To get a wrestlers recent matches only use [aewresults count=’7′ wrestler=’adam-page’]
sections.faq:
Any Upcoming Features?

Adding the ability to return results by show and other various filters. If showing results for one wrestler only you will see the wrestlers name, total matches, wins, losses and win percentage.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Initial plugin release

0.2

  • Released 2024-09-15
  • Added the ability to add wrestler to shortcake to just get their results.

short_description: Display a custom number of recent results from All Elite Wrestling matches or from a wrestler.

You can now display results from All Elite Wrestling events from all shows like Dynamite, Rampage, Collision, PPVs and others.

You also have the option to just display recent recents from a particular wrestler, handy if you have a wrestlers profile on your website.
